text:
Jebbit,Inc | Boston, MA | Full Time, ONSITE | http://jebbit.com | Front End Lead and Coder for Post Click Marketing Startup.

We're using EmberJS/Ruby on Rails. You should know modern client-side frameworks/paradigms (ie, MVC), have strong SASS/CSS skills and be awesome.

Want to help us build the UI team? Want to just code and help build an incredible UI? What to help build the best Post Click Marketing business? We want to talk to you!

https://www.jebbit.com/company/careers/#toggle-id-3
